promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute simple goat electric-type wearing a golden crown. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or goat. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crownor, a chibi cute simple goat electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: thunder-shock, thunder-cage. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word goat or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, goat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Crownor likes to climb the highest peaks, discharging shocks of electricity to protect its home. Come share a Sparkshock moment!
